meanings.definition: A small mass of hair or other material that has become tangled or matted.
meanings.sent1: The cat coughed up a furball on the carpet.
meanings.sent2: I brushed my dog to prevent furballs from forming.
meanings.sent3: Finding a furball on the couch is never a pleasant surprise.
meanings.sent4: The furball of yarn rolled under the table, out of reach.
meanings.sent5: The furball stuck in the drain caused a clog in the sink.

meanings.definition: A round, fluffy object resembling a ball, typically made of fur.
meanings.sent1: The child played with a soft furball toy in the nursery.
meanings.sent2: The cute kitten chased after the furball as it rolled across the floor.
meanings.sent3: The furball pillow was the perfect addition to the cozy living room.
meanings.sent4: She held the furball close, feeling its warmth against her palm.
meanings.sent5: The furball of dust bunnies under the bed grew larger each day.
